TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CachedDataItem extends Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataNodeBase

summary.span: 表示文档级自定义中的缓存数据对象，该文档级自定义通过使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具创建。

span.span: Represents a cached data object in a document-level customization that was created by using the Office development tools in Visual Studio.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关在文档级自定义项中缓存数据的详细信息，请参阅[缓存数据](/visualstudio/vsto/caching-data.md)和[访问的服务器上的文档数据](/visualstudio/vsto/accessing-data-in-documents-on-the-server.md)。For more information about caching data in document-level customizations, see [Caching Data](/visualstudio/vsto/caching-data.md) and [Accessing Data in Documents on the Server](/visualstudio/vsto/accessing-data-in-documents-on-the-server.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例检查每个Excel 工作簿，并在显示的数据缓存中的每个名称缓存数据对象。The following code example examines each in the data cache of an Excel workbook and displays the name of each cached data object. 此示例需要：This example requires: - 控制台应用程序项目或某些其他非 Office 项目。A console application project or some other non-Office project. - 对以下程序集的引用：References to the following assemblies: - Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.dllMicrosoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.dll - Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.dllMicrosoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.dll - `Imports` （对于 Visual Basic) 或`using`（对于 C#) 语句和代码文件顶部的命名空间。`Imports` (for Visual Basic) or `using` (for C#) statements for and namespaces at the top of your code file. [!code-csharp[Trin_ServerDocument#5](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ServerDocument/CS/Form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[Trin_ServerDocument#5](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ServerDocument/VB/Form1.vb#5)]

summary.span: 获取或设置缓存数据对象类型的程序集限定名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the assembly-qualified name of the type of the cached data object.

value.span: 缓存的数据对象的类型的程序集限定名称。

span.span: The assembly-qualified name of the type of the cached data object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回可用于创建自定义类型的新实例存在于数据缓存的缓存的数据类型的程序集限定名称。The property returns an assembly-qualified name of the cached data type that is useful for creating a new instance of a custom type that is in the data cache. 例如，你可以获得通过将传递到的程序集限定类型名称的自定义数据类型方法。For example, you can get the of a custom data type by passing the assembly-qualified type name to the method. 你可以然后创建自定义类型的实例，通过将此传递作为参数传递给方法。You can then create an instance of the custom type by passing this as a parameter to the method. 返回的程序集限定类型字符串的格式有关的详细信息属性，请参阅属性。For details about the format of the assembly-qualified type string that is returned by the property, see the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法可以修改的字符串的缓存的 Excel 工作簿的工作表中的值。The following code example uses the method to modify the value of a string that is cached in a worksheet of an Excel workbook. 该代码使用属性以验证缓存的数据对象，在尝试对其进行修改之前是字符串。The code uses the property to verify that the cached data object is a string before trying to modify it. 此示例需要：This example requires: - 具有的 Excel 的文档级自定义项`Sheet1`类`ExcelWorkbook1`命名空间，和中的缓存的字符串`Sheet1`类名为`CachedString`。A document-level customization for Excel that has a `Sheet1` class in the `ExcelWorkbook1` namespace, and a cached string in the `Sheet1` class named `CachedString`. - 控制台应用程序项目或某些其他非 Office 项目。A console application project or some other non-Office project. - 对以下程序集的引用：References to the following assemblies: - Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.dllMicrosoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.dll - Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.dllMicrosoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.dll - `Imports` （对于 Visual Basic) 或`using`（对于 C#) 语句和代码文件顶部的命名空间。`Imports` (for Visual Basic) or `using` (for C#) statements for and namespaces at the top of your code file. [!code-csharp[Trin_ServerDocument#9](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ServerDocument/CS/Form1.cs#9)] [!code-vb[Trin_ServerDocument#9](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ServerDocument/VB/Form1.vb#9)]

summary.span: 获取或设置通过 表示的缓存数据对象的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the cached data object that is represented by the .

value.span: 由缓存的数据对象的名称。

span.span: The name of the cached data object that is represented by the .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性要在 Excel 工作簿中显示的缓存的数据对象的名称。The following code example uses the property to display the names of the cached data objects in an Excel workbook. 此示例需要：This example requires: - 控制台应用程序项目或某些其他非 Office 项目。A console application project or some other non-Office project. - 对以下程序集的引用：References to the following assemblies: - Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.dllMicrosoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.dll - Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.dllMicrosoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.dll - `Imports` （对于 Visual Basic) 或`using`（对于 C#) 语句和代码文件顶部的命名空间。`Imports` (for Visual Basic) or `using` (for C#) statements for and namespaces at the top of your code file. summary.span: 如果缓存数据对象为 或 ，获取或设置描述由 表示的缓存数据对象的架构。

span.span: Gets or sets a schema that describes the cached data object that is represented by the , if the cached data object is a or .

value.span: 如果缓存的数据对象是或，此属性返回的架构，用于描述缓存的数据对象中; 否则为。

span.span: If the cached data object is a or , this property returns a schema that describes the cached data object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Examples 有关代码示例演示如何使用属性，请参阅[ServerDocument 示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/4d5a9093-d648-4c66-a182-65bebf6016d7)。For a code example that demonstrates how to use the property, see [ServerDocument Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/4d5a9093-d648-4c66-a182-65bebf6016d7).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SerializeDataInstance(object value) cil managed

param.name: value
param.span: 该对象包含要保存到数据缓存中的对象的数据。

span.span: The object that contains the data you want to save to an object in the data cache.

summary.span: 将数据序列化为通过 表示的缓存数据对象。

span.span: Serializes data to the cached data object that is represented by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法以初始化或修改缓存的数据对象的值。Use the method to initialize or modify the value of a cached data object. 此方法序列化`value`到缓存的数据的参数对象表示。This method serializes the `value` parameter into the cached data object that the represents. 如对复杂的缓存的数据对象中的特定数据值进行更改或反序列化的 XML 表示形式的缓存数据到缓存的对象的新实例，对此副本进行更改，然后使用方法要序列化所做的更改回数据缓存。To make changes to specific data values in a complex cached data object, such as a or , deserialize the XML representation of the cached data into a new instance of the cached object, make the changes to this copy, and then use the method to serialize the changes back into the data cache. 有关详细信息，请参阅[访问的服务器上的文档数据](/visualstudio/vsto/accessing-data-in-documents-on-the-server.md)和[演练： 更改服务器上的工作簿中的缓存数据](/visualstudio/vsto/walkthrough-changing-cached-data-in-a-workbook-on-a-server.md)。For more information, see [Accessing Data in Documents on the Server](/visualstudio/vsto/accessing-data-in-documents-on-the-server.md) and [Walkthrough: Changing Cached Data in a Workbook on a Server](/visualstudio/vsto/walkthrough-changing-cached-data-in-a-workbook-on-a-server.md). 此方法用于序列化使用 DiffGram 格式， ，并键入到数据缓存的数据集对象。This method uses the DiffGram format for serializing , , and typed dataset objects into the data cache. 这可确保对数据缓存对脱机文档中的更改正确发送到服务器。This ensures that changes to the data cache in an offline document are sent to the server correctly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法可以修改的字符串的缓存的 Excel 工作簿的工作表中的值。The following code example uses the method to modify the value of a string that is cached in a worksheet of an Excel workbook. 此示例需要：This example requires: - 具有的 Excel 的文档级自定义项`Sheet1`类`ExcelWorkbook1`命名空间，和中的缓存的字符串`Sheet1`类名为`CachedString`。A document-level customization for Excel that has a `Sheet1` class in the `ExcelWorkbook1` namespace, and a cached string in the `Sheet1` class named `CachedString`. - 控制台应用程序项目或某些其他非 Office 项目。A console application project or some other non-Office project. - 对以下程序集的引用：References to the following assemblies: - Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.dllMicrosoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.dll - Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.dllMicrosoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.dll - `Imports` （对于 Visual Basic) 或`using`（对于 C#) 语句和代码文件顶部的命名空间。`Imports` (for Visual Basic) or `using` (for C#) statements for and namespaces at the top of your code file. [!code-csharp[Trin_ServerDocument#9](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ServerDocument/CS/Form1.cs#9)] [!code-vb[Trin_ServerDocument#9](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ServerDocument/VB/Form1.vb#9)]

summary.span: 获取或设置由 表示的缓存数据对象的 XML 表示形式。

span.span: Gets or sets the XML representation of the cached data object that is represented by the .

value.span: XML 表示形式表示的缓存的数据对象。

span.span: The XML representation of the cached data object that is represented by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要获取的缓存的数据对象的值，请使用属性进行反序列化的 XML 表示形式的缓存数据到缓存的数据对象的新实例。To get the value of a cached data object, use the property to deserialize the XML representation of the cached data into a new instance of the cached data object. 可以对此副本进行更改，随后可序列化回数据缓存的更改。You can then make changes to this copy and serialize the changes back into the data cache. 在大多数情况下，你可以使用方法已更改的对象序列化为数据缓存。In most cases, you can use the method to serialize the changed object into the data cache. 如果你想要对缓存的数据的更改执行你自己的序列化，你还可以编写直接属性。If you want to perform your own serialization for changes to cached data, you can also write directly to the property. 但是，如果你更改到， ，或将通过更新到数据库的类型化数据集，将更改写入缓存的数据时指定 DiffGram 格式。However, if you are making changes to a , , or a typed dataset that will be updated to a database by using a , specify the DiffGram format when you write the changes to the cached data. 否则为对更改或将作为新行，而不是已更改的行添加到数据库。Otherwise, the changes to the or will be added to the database as new rows instead of changed rows. 有关详细信息，请参阅[访问的服务器上的文档数据](/visualstudio/vsto/accessing-data-in-documents-on-the-server.md)。For more information, see [Accessing Data in Documents on the Server](/visualstudio/vsto/accessing-data-in-documents-on-the-server.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性来获取缓存的 Excel 工作簿的工作表中的字符串值。The following code example uses the property to get the value of a string that is cached in a worksheet of an Excel workbook. 该示例在一个消息框中显示的值。The example displays the value in a message box. 此示例需要：This example requires: - 具有的 Excel 的文档级自定义项`Sheet1`类`ExcelWorkbook1`命名空间，和中的缓存的字符串`Sheet1`类名为`CachedString`。A document-level customization for Excel that has a `Sheet1` class in the `ExcelWorkbook1` namespace, and a cached string in the `Sheet1` class named `CachedString`. - 控制台应用程序项目或某些其他非 Office 项目。A console application project or some other non-Office project. - 对以下程序集的引用：References to the following assemblies: - Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.dllMicrosoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.dll - Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.dllMicrosoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.dll - `Imports` （对于 Visual Basic) 或`using`（对于 C#) 语句和代码文件顶部的命名空间。`Imports` (for Visual Basic) or `using` (for C#) statements for and namespaces at the top of your code file. [!code-csharp[Trin_ServerDocument#10](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ServerDocument/CS/Form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[Trin_ServerDocument#10](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ServerDocument/VB/Form1.vb#10)] 有关代码示例演示如何使用属性来修改和序列化对缓存更改，请参阅[演练： 更改服务器上的工作簿中的缓存数据](/visualstudio/vsto/walkthrough-changing-cached-data-in-a-workbook-on-a-server.md)。For a code example that demonstrates how to use the property to modify and serialize changes to a cached , see [Walkthrough: Changing Cached Data in a Workbook on a Server](/visualstudio/vsto/walkthrough-changing-cached-data-in-a-workbook-on-a-server.md).
